# pytc2

A circuit theory module for students at Universidad Tecnol√≥gica Nacional, en Buenos Aires, Argentina.

* Free software: MIT license
* [online Documentation](https://pytc2.readthedocs.io)

## Installation

```bash
$ pip install pytc2
```

## Usage

- Check the jupyter notebook examples in the documentation for fast starting.

Interested in contributing? Check out the contributing guidelines. Please note that this project is released with a Code of Conduct. By contributing to this project, you agree to abide by its terms.
